## Source: ossf-package-analysis (bed5e4b150f949434786803be46122fa169432748424017c770c2582c50b6558)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'next-minimal-server' @ 10.0.1 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
